channel.title: R on Fishy Data
channel.description: Recent content in R on Fishy Data

item.title: Pushing like a dream with git alias
item.description: For years I have staged, committed and pushed via the RStudio Git interface. It works! But it can be time-consuming when you are doing it a lot. And is not very dreamy. And I’ve been trying to use my mouse less. My breaking point to find an alternative method was while building this blog (blogdown R package). Every time blogdown::build_site() is run many files are changed, all of which can be staged, committed and pushed at once without much thought.
